abstract: Dale Earnhardt Jr voices support for removal of Confederate battle flag from South Carolina State House grounds, calling flag offensive; statement comes after Nascar said that it supported calls to remove flag; other automobile racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr., one of Nascar’s most popular drivers, called the flag “offensive to an entire race,” and he voiced his support for its removal from the grounds of the South Carolina State House.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr., one of Nascar’s most popular drivers, called the flag “offensive to an entire race,” and he voiced his support for its removal from the grounds of the South Carolina State House.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
